revised_title: Insulin Signalling and Regulation of PEPCK Gene Expression
tldr: This article explores the regulation of phosphoenolpyruvate carboxykinase (PEPCK) gene expression by insulin. It discusses the role of 1-phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase (PI 3-kinase) in this process and the involvement of various protein kinases. The study also highlights the connection between insulin resistance and diabetes mellitus.
